shri lanka nidahas pakshaya namathi kanthawage thanapata galawa ada eya sirikothata wisi kara athi bawath, me thaththwayata thawaduratath ida nodena bawath parlimenthuwe eekabaddha wipakshaye parlimenthu manthri dalas alahapperuma mahatha sandahan kaleya.

agamathi yatathe parlimenthuwa wyawasthapitha mandalayak bawata pariwarthanaya kara ee haraha pathkala komiti margayen wiwida mathruka osse athura wartha janathawata danaganimata salaswima, owun athara udyogayak saha kuthuhalayak athikirima, wiraddha matha idiripath kirima mema kriyawaliya pasupasa athi salasumwala thawa angayaki.
